usa: President William McKinley was assassinated by Leon Czolgosz in Buffalo, New York.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference">[1]</sup>
Vice President Theodore Roosevelt was sworn in as president, after the assassination of President McKinley.<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference">[2]</sup>
The Hay–Pauncefote Treaty was signed.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference">[3]</sup>
